channel.title: Chicago on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: done
item.description: i am tore down. i am thinking about taking most of tonight off. heh. my life is awesome.did I mention awesome?

item.title: doh..
item.description: it looks like the fun is over.. sad day. I hope it will only be a temp. provision. I would be sad - after all it just opened. suxor. stupid E2

item.title: keel yer idles
item.description: soo.. this is my friend ben. he is a scooter dork. seriously. yep. he is. I have found my perfect woman. I just have to email her. and love. instant, instant love. other than my new GF, one of the coolest things I have seen as of late is this - woah.

item.title: back at work
item.description: Today I am back at work after a four day holiday. It was great. I hung out with my grandfather and my cousin and did all of the tourist stuff that chicago has to offer.. It was a lot of fun. Tonight I am apparentlyl having a small bday party with some friends.. it should be fun. I hope people come. but whatever.. ;) Being back at work is nice. I like to work.
